name: Antics Digital Marketing
overview:
Antics is a digital marketing company that creates integrated marketing programs for Fortune 1000 companies. It specializes in complex environments such as regulated industries, intricate technology solutions, and reaching sophisticated audiences.

Antics Digital Marketing System (DMS) is cloud-based software platform that allows marketers to quickly and easily create sophisticated, personalized and relevant customer experiences across digital channels – Facebook, web, mobile and email. It combines key features from several different types of software into a single integrated platform, including CRM, CMS, analytics, surveys, referral, loyalty, social, mobile and email marketing.
